title: Policy evaluator incorrectly evaluates function arguments as conditions
description: BUG: The ConditionEvaluator._evaluate_expression() method has a while loop that handles parentheses by finding innermost parentheses and evaluating their contents. This incorrectly matches function call parentheses like freeze_period(2024-12-20, 2025-01-02) and tries to evaluate the arguments as conditions, which fails. Functions without arguments (business_hours(), weekday(), peak_traffic()) work correctly.
